summary: Hi, I'm Ngo Van Tien Dat, a third-year Information Technology student at Ho Chi Minh City University of Technology (HUTECH). My goal is to become a skilled Flutter developer, and I'm always eager to learn and take on challenges. I thrive in both collaborative teamwork and independent work environments. Please feel free to take a look at my resume whenever you have the chance.

I have some basic certifications in programming and experience participating in programming competitions like the Olympics and participating in algorithm sites Codelearn.io. Besides, I have the ability to self-study, teamwork, and the ability to withstand work pressure.
Improving the UI & UX of Femicam's desktop application based on React Electron and Material UI
Designing and creating React components for the application dashboard

projects.name: Kiwis
summary: Kiwis is a mobile application that allows users to find and book services in their area. It is built with Flutter and Dart, and uses Firebase for authentication, database, and cloud storage. The application also uses VietMap for map services and AWS for cloud storage.

details.title: Overview
items: Kiwis is a comprehensive social networking and planning application that seamlessly combines social connectivity with practical lifestyle management. As the lead developer, I architected and implemented several innovative features that set this app apart:

details.title: Social Networking Core
items: Real-time social feed with instant updates using Socket.IO and Firebase Cloud Messaging
Robust friend system with personalized connection recommendations
Group creation and management with role-based permissions
Real-time messaging system supporting text, images, and location sharing

details.title: Advanced Planning System
items: Interactive plan creation with customizable templates and location integration
Smart expense tracking and splitting functionality for group activities
Real-time location sharing and navigation using VietMap SDK
Intelligent task management with location-based reminders and notifications

details.title: Safety & Emergency Features
items: SOS system with instant location broadcasting to group members
Emergency contact integration with one-tap calling
Real-time location tracking for group members during active plans

details.title: Technical Achievements
items: Implemented efficient real-time data synchronization using Socket.IO, reducing latency by 40%
Integrated VietMap SDK for precise location services with custom markers and routing
Designed a scalable backend architecture using Node.js and MySQL
Utilized AWS for reliable media storage and Cloudinary for optimized image delivery
Achieved 99.9% crash-free sessions through comprehensive error handling and testing

features.title: Real-time Social Connectivity
features.description: Users can share moments instantly, connect with friends, and engage in real-time conversations, creating a vibrant social ecosystem.

features.title: Smart Plan Management
features.description: Create and manage detailed plans with location integration, expense tracking, and real-time updates for all participants.

features.title: Location Intelligence
features.description: Seamless integration with VietMap for navigation, location sharing, and point-of-interest discovery during plan execution.

features.title: Safety First
features.description: Advanced SOS features with instant location sharing and emergency contact integration ensure user safety during activities.

features.title: Group Dynamics
features.description: Comprehensive group management with real-time messaging, shared plans, and collaborative expense tracking.

projects.name: ECourse
summary: A modern e-learning platform built with Flutter and NestJS, providing comprehensive learning management features.

details.title: Overview
items: ECourse is a full-featured e-learning platform that connects students with educational content through an intuitive mobile interface.

details.title: Learning Features
items: Interactive course content with video, text, and quiz support
Progress tracking and achievement system
Personalized learning paths
Real-time assessment and feedback

details.title: User Experience
items: Intuitive course navigation and content organization
Offline content access capability
Cross-platform synchronization
Interactive discussion forums and peer learning

details.title: Technical Stack
items: Flutter frontend with GetX state management
NestJS backend with MongoDB database
Cloudinary integration for media management
Real-time notification system
Secure authentication and authorization

projects.name: Pulse Music Streaming
summary: Web application for listening to music using Spring Boot security, thymeleaf
Designed MySQL database schema, Developed backend with Java Spring Boot, integrated frontend and backend
User authentication and authorization, Admin dashboard, CRUD operations, mailer, Server-side rendering with Thymeleaf, Cloudinary for media storage, OAuth2 for authentication.

details.title: Overview
items: A comprehensive music streaming platform built with Spring Boot and Thymeleaf, offering a rich set of features for both users and administrators.

details.title: Core Features
items: User authentication and authorization system with OAuth2 integration
Advanced music player with playlist management
Artist and album management system
User profile customization and social features

details.title: Admin Dashboard
items: Comprehensive admin panel for content management
User management and role-based access control
Analytics and reporting features
Content moderation tools

details.title: Technical Implementation
items: Designed and implemented scalable MySQL database schema
Integrated Cloudinary for efficient media storage and delivery
Implemented server-side rendering using Thymeleaf
Built robust CRUD operations with Spring Boot
Integrated email notification system

projects.name: ECourse Backend
summary: Backend infrastructure for the ECourse platform, built with NestJS and MongoDB.

details.title: Overview
items: A robust backend system powering the ECourse platform, providing scalable and secure API services.

details.title: API Features
items: RESTful API design with comprehensive documentation
Real-time data synchronization
Secure user authentication and authorization
File upload and management system

details.title: Database Design
items: Optimized MongoDB schema design
Efficient data querying and aggregation
Data validation and sanitization
Automated backup and recovery systems

details.title: Technical Implementation
items: NestJS modules and services architecture
JWT-based authentication system
Role-based access control
Integration with third-party services
Comprehensive error handling and logging

certifications.name: JavaScript Essentials 2
certifications.description: Advanced algorithms and data structures certification with practical problem-solving

certifications.name: Data Visualization with R
certifications.description: Fundamental understanding of Data Visualization with R
